title: GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_FLAG
content:
0x6B7AF743// GetInteriorRoomFlag
int GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_FLAG(int interiorId, int roomIndex);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.roomIndex: Interior room index.Returns: Room's flag.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomHash = GetRoomKeyFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomId = GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash(interiorId, roomHash)

if roomId ~= -1 then
  local roomFlag = GetInteriorRoomFlag(interiorId, roomId)
  print("current room flag is: " .. roomFlag)
end
codeBlocks:
// GetInteriorRoomFlag
int GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_FLAG(int interiorId, int roomIndex);

local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomHash = GetRoomKeyFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomId = GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash(interiorId, roomHash)

if roomId ~= -1 then
  local roomFlag = GetInteriorRoomFlag(interiorId, roomId)
end
